name: Black Raspberry Vanilla scented Double Trouble whipped thick body butter
description:
Why double trouble? Our thick body butter is made with two of the most important butters for your skin: Cocoa butter and Shea butter. Both of these butters together give your skin the maximum moisture it needs to be soft and nourished without leaving a greasy feeling to your skin. We also add grape seed oil, apricot oil, rice bran oil and Vitamin E in our body butter. So that's where the double trouble comes in at because with all of these finest ingredients dry skin and eczema doesn't stand a chance. 

8 ounce jar of double trouble whipped body butter in an enticing blend of blackberries and raspberries, with middle notes of white floral greenery, and bottom notes of musk and vanilla. 


**Summertime notice** Because this is cocoa butter and shea butter it will melt in the summer heat during shipping. Please keep this in mind when ordering. Once received place container in the refrigerator to harden back up and product will be like new again. 

Discontinue use if irritation occurs.

name: Black Cherry 8 ounce jar candle
description:
An extremely strong aroma of ripened sweet black cherries. Our 8 ounce hexagon shaped candle will fill any room with a Dliteful scent. All natural soy wax with cotton wick to create a cleaner and longer burn.  



**Summer Note: The wax may melt if allowed to get too hot. This can happen anytime in transit or in your mail box/porch.  Please be aware of this BEFORE you place your order.  We cannot be held responsible for any melted products. If the item does melt, it will harden again in a cooler temperature but the design still may be damaged, but the actual wax will still smell great! 


Burn only on a stable heat resistant surface. Keep from drafts. Do not burn candle when wax is less than 1/2 inch from bottom. Do not touch or move candle while burning, or if wax is hot. Never leave candle burning unattended. Keep out of reach of children.

name: Pina Colada scented umbrella drink candles
description:
A tropical combination of sweet pineapple and coconut.  Our happy hour umbrella drinks are going to be a big conversation piece at any gathering. Designed to look like any umbrella drink with fruit embeds, whipped wax to look like whipped cream and an umbrella. 
This candle is 12oz and made with all natural soy wax and cotton wicks. 


**Summer Note: The wax may melt if allowed to get too hot. This can happen anytime in transit or in your mail box/porch.  Please be aware of this BEFORE you place your order.  We cannot be held responsible for any melted products. If the item does melt, it will harden again in a cooler temperature but the design still may be damaged, but the actual wax will still smell great! 


Remove all embeds before burning. Burn only on a stable heat resistant surface. Keep from drafts. Do not burn candle when wax is less than 1/2 inch from bottom. Do not touch or move candle while burning, or if wax is hot. Never leave candle burning unattended. Keep out of reach of children.

name: Strawberry Shortcake Scented Wax Melts
description:
The aroma of buttery vanilla cake with notes of freshly sliced strawberries, with base notes of rich vanilla cream.  Scented soy wax melts for use in melters/wax warmers.  You will receive 5 small wax melts that weigh an average of 2oz - 2.5 oz of wax made with a soy-paraffin wax blend.



**Summer Note: The wax may melt if allowed to get too hot. This can happen anytime in transit or in your mail box/porch.  Please be aware of this BEFORE you place your order.  We cannot be held responsible for any melted products. If the item does melt, it will harden again in a cooler temperature but the design still may be damaged, but the actual wax will still smell great! 


Use full size melt or cut into chunks depending on the size of your melter/warmer or desired scent load. Melt and enjoy! 

Always follow the manufacturers directions for your wax melter/warmer. Failure to follow these directions could result in unexpected fire hazard or personal injury. Use only in a well ventilated, low heat wax melter/warmer without lid. Do not add water. Melt enough product to have 1/2 inch of product in pot. Use only in wax melters/warmers designed for wax melts.

name: McIntosh Apple scented Teachers Have Class candle
description:
The aroma of crisp, juicy, sweet and sour McIntosh Apples.Any teacher would love to receive this unique gift. 


All natural soy wax with cotton wicks and is 12 ounces of wax with Teachers Have Class, chalk and marker wax tart embeds that can be put into any favorite warmer and have the smell of McIntosh Apple scent. Hand painted in acrylic paint that will come right off in the warmer once melted and each to throw away with no mess of paint in your warmer. 



**Summer Note: The wax may melt if allowed to get too hot. This can happen anytime in transit or in your mail box/porch.  Please be aware of this BEFORE you place your order.  We cannot be held responsible for any melted products. If the item does melt, it will harden again in a cooler temperature but the design still may be damaged, but the actual wax will still smell great! 


Remove all embeds before burning. Burn only on a stable heat resistant surface. Keep from drafts. Do not burn candle when wax is less than 1/2 inch from bottom. Do not touch or move candle while burning, or if wax is hot. Never leave candle burning unattended. Keep out of reach of children.
